0c-4698-a011-beae8a8acb3a%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_rev_rgb.png> 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bc126220d-91e1-40d2-b6cb-df0b6286d51c%7D_2023-brand-leaf.png> 	

Important Notice: Non-Reimbursable Providers 

 	 
Dear Valued Member, 

As part of Cigna Healthcare’s commitment to ensuring access to quality healthcare services, we wish to inform you of an upcoming change that affects a small number of providers in the UAE. 

Please note that these select providers are now classed as Non-Reimbursable Providers, meaning that under your Cigna Healthcare policy, any claim incurred at these providers is not eligible for cover or reimbursement. 

We encourage our members to benefit from our extensive network of in-network providers from whom they can seek the same treatment. Cigna Healthcare members in the UAE have access to over 3,600 contracted providers, covering all specialties and giving members cashless access to care. 

The full network list can be accessed through the Cigna mobile app. 

This decision is based on several factors such as reimbursement rates, as well as working with providers who align more closely with our commitment to deliver timely, high-quality care and support. 

Please click here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F12ceCYlOPULRYDOi9iqIxcblW%3Fdomain%3Dcigna-me.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C347bad66f15544afb20908dd145e064f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638689116251909765%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=er9u%2FsvWTi%2BPE4nDVSSjtP1Z2cGhmJPx1B9NR7ffU0Y%3D&reserved=0>  to access the list of Non-Reimbursable Providers.

chunks.text:
OiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=er9u%2FsvWTi%2BPE4nDVSSjtP1Z2cGhmJPx1B9NR7ffU0Y%3D&reserved=0>  to access the list of Non-Reimbursable Providers. 

This list will be updated monthly and is available on our website <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FerMZCZmPQt5Zv72SysEIBdYbF%3Fdomain%3Dcigna-me.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C347bad66f15544afb20908dd145e064f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638689116251924949%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=hDQq3tu0v8WWnPiyQjtUm0FIThjKFxCwWxPid7hth3k%3D&reserved=0>  so it can be bookmarked for future reference. We advise that you review it prior to your visits to avoid any rejection of claims and to review the network list to identify alternative providers. If you require any assistance finding an alternative provider, you can contact our Customer Service team. 

Members will not be eligible to claim reimbursement for claims incurred at these Non-Reimbursable Providers for services incurred from January 1, 2025, onwards. 

We are deeply committed to ensuring that you have seamless access to care and are confident that alternative providers within the network will be able to assist. 

If you have any questions, you can contact us at the numbers on the back of your insurance card. 

Thank you for your attention. 

Regards, 

Cigna Healthcare MEA
